meta.title: Delete All Redirects - Redirects - Store Content - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
By default, it deletes all Redirect URLs in a store. 



Deprecated

Avoid using this API operation if possible. It will be removed in a future version....

blocks.data:
By default, it deletes all *Redirect URLs* in a store.
### **Deprecated** Avoid using this API operation if possible. It will be removed in a future version. For the most up-to-date version of this API, see [Delete Redirects v3](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-reference/storefront/redirects/redirects/deleteredirects) to delete redirects URLs.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Content | modify | `store_v2_content` |
|  Content | read-only | `store_v2_content_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header
